section.title: How to contact us
section.para: Se você tiver perguntas, idéias para novas funções ou comentários para algo por favor use os links nesta página para enviá-las ao lugar certo!

formalpara.para: If you find bugs in BibleTime use this link to report it so it can be fixed in later versions.
If you have problems with BibleTime use this link to get support how to solve them.
If you have an idea how to improve BibleTime please use this link to tell about it!
If you have problem with the webpages or if youhave some ideas how to improve them please write it down using the link!
